title: The Greatest Love Story
description:
Join Team Indigo for an Amazing Workshop Event that offers so many returned Gifts and Love for our Expedited Healing that those in attendance were in awe of the Amazing Healing Love of Source.

The events that unfolded during this workshop allowed for a 40 Year Time Leap which was needed due to the Red Dragons plan for Official Disclosure, and invasion of earth. The solution to this situation has returned access to physical Slide Zone 3, to Ascension Races, (called Aquafereion), which corresponds to Density 3 of New Earth (Ascension Earth), opening the Sala Sira Chambers from Density 2 Sirius B Edonic Temples through Sala and into our System.
